plot: After recovering from injuries sustained fighting in the North Caucasus, Captain Timofey Smolin is assigned to the border in the quiet Russian Northwest. He soon finds it's not so quiet after all.
plot_en: After recovering from injuries sustained fighting in the North Caucasus, Captain Timofey Smolin is assigned to the border in the quiet Russian Northwest. He soon finds it's not so quiet after all.
plot_es: After recovering from injuries sustained fighting in the North Caucasus, Captain Timofey Smolin is assigned to the border in the quiet Russian Northwest. He soon finds it's not so quiet after all.
title: Na rubezhe. Otvetnyy udar
